abilities.name: Wear Cloak
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Trash Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Metal Energy card and attach it to Burmy Trash Cloak.

attacks.name: Trash Cloak Tackle
attacks.text: If Burmy Trash Cloak has any Metal Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
